    UNLEASH THE HERO WITHIN

    ABOUT ALEGRIA

    THE MARVEL EXPERIENCE

    Welcome to Alegria 2025 - where the extraordinary meets the exceptional. This year, we're bringing the Marvel Universe to life in the most spectacular college fest you've ever witnessed.

    Get ready for three days of non-stop action, creativity, and celebration as we transform our campus into a superhero headquarters. Whether you're a performer, competitor, or spectator - your hero's journey begins here.

    EPIC THEME

    Experience the Marvel Universe come to life with immersive decorations, superhero vibes, and cinematic experiences.

    POWER-PACKED EVENTS

    From cultural performances to technical competitions, sports, and informal games - unleash your superpowers.

    UNITE AS HEROES

    Join thousands of students in celebrating creativity, talent, and the spirit of heroism at our greatest fest yet.

    EPIC EVENTS

    CHOOSE YOUR ADVENTURE

    CULTURAL

    Dance & Music

    Showcase your talents in solo and group performances, battle competitions, and live concerts.

    TECHNICAL

    Tech Competitions

    Coding challenges, hackathons, robotics, and AI workshops for the tech-savvy heroes.

    SPORTS

    Athletic Events

    Cricket, football, basketball, athletics, and more. Compete for glory and prizes.

    INFORMAL

    Fun & Games

    Treasure hunts, gaming tournaments, cosplay contests, and surprise celebrity appearances.

    More events to be announced soon. Stay tuned for updates!

    Registration Opens Soon
